entry.title: Java Codes for Some Sorting Methods
entry.content:
``` java Insertion Sort public static void insSort(int[] a) {

int mark = 0; // current insertion value

for (int i = 1; i < a.length; i++) {
    mark = a[i];

    int j = i - 1;
    while (j >= 0 && a[j] > mark) {
        int temp = a[j];
        a[j] = a[j + 1];
        a[j + 1] = temp;
        j--;
    }
}

} ```

``` java Selection Sort public static void selSort(int[] a) {

for (int i = 0; i < a.length; i++) {
    int minSpot = i;

    for (int j = i + 1; j < a.length; j++)
        if (a[j] < a[minSpot] ) {
            int temp = a[minSpot] ;
            a[minSpot] = a[j];
            a[j] = temp;
        }
}

} ```

``` java Bubble Sort public static void bubSort(int[] a) {

for (int i = 0; i < a.length; i++)
    for (int j = i + 1; j < a.length; j++)
        if (a[j] < a[i]) {
            int temp = a[j];
            a[j] = a[i];
            a[i] = temp;
        }

} ```

``` java Quick Sort public static void qckSort(int[] a, int lm, int rm) {

// end of recursion
if (lm < rm) {
    int pivot = a[lm + (rm - lm) / 2]; // pivot in the middle

    // divide et conquer
    int lf = lm, rf = rm; // mark flags be the markers
    while (lf <= rf) {
        while (a[lf] < pivot)
            lf++;

        while (a[rf] > pivot)
            rf--;

        if (lf < rf) {
            int temp = a[rf];
            a[rf] = a[lf];
            a[lf] = temp;
            lf++;
            rf--;
        } else if (lf == rf) {
            lf++;
            rf--;
        }
    }

    // recursion
    if (rm > lf)
        qckSort(a, lf, rm);
    if (lm < rf)
        qckSort(a, lm, rf);
}

} ```
